title: Benchmark Suite - Automated quality and performance testing
description: Create automated framework for quality and performance testing of completions.

title: Moderate JSDoc cleanup across codebase
description: Remove redundant JSDoc parameter descriptions while keeping method summaries and @returns. Target: eliminate obvious documentation that duplicates type information or method names, but preserve complex algorithm explanations, non-obvious error handling, and deprecated notices.
close_reason: JSDoc cleanup completed - removed redundant parameter descriptions while preserving method summaries and important notes

title: Remove 'any' type assertion for proposed API (completionProvider.ts:300-301)
description: CompleteBracketPairs is a proposed API using type assertion. Should either remove or use proper type guard.

title: Implement isModifierPressed() method (completionProvider.ts:578)
description: The isModifierPressed() method is a stub that always returns false. Should implement actual modifier key detection.

title: Multi-line Context Balancing - Optimize before/after cursor ratio
description: Optimize the 60/40 before/after cursor ratio based on language-specific patterns for better context.

title: Extract magic number 3 in document change check (completionProvider.ts:431)
description: The value 3 is used to check for too many simultaneous changes. Should be a named constant.

title: Optimize regex with character sets (codeUtils.ts:615-620,846-850)
description: findNextWordBoundary() iterates through characters testing multiple regex patterns. Use character set for O(1) lookup instead of O(n) pattern matching.

title: Rename hasUnclosedBraces for clarity (syntaxChecker.ts:54-93)
description: Function checks for square brackets [], not curly braces {}. Inconsistent with common terminology. Rename to hasUnclosedBrackets().

title: Telemetry Integration - Anonymous usage tracking
description: Implement anonymous usage tracking to understand completion patterns and improve quality over time.

title: Speculative Decoding - Use input as reference for parallel token generation
description: Implement speculative decoding pattern from Zed for 2-3x speedup without quality loss. Use user input as reference to generate tokens in parallel.

title: Remove placeholder code in accept commands (extension.ts:166-237)
description: The acceptWord, acceptLine, and acceptFull commands contain simulated completion text that should be replaced with actual completion logic.

title: Clean up JSDoc in extension.ts
description: Minor cleanup in src/extension.ts: Remove obvious @param description like '@param {vscode.ExtensionContext} context - The extension context' (lines 31-36), keeping TypeScript typing information
close_reason: JSDoc cleanup completed - removed redundant parameter descriptions while preserving method summaries and important notes

title: User Preference Learning - Learn from acceptance patterns
description: Learn from user acceptance patterns to weight and improve future completion suggestions.

title: Custom System Prompts - Override language-specific prompts
description: Allow users to override language-specific system prompts with custom configurations.

title: Extract hardcoded cache constants (cacheManager.ts:17)
description: Default cache size of 100 and 60000ms TTL are hardcoded. Extract to named constants: DEFAULT_CACHE_SIZE, DEFAULT_CACHE_TTL

title: Separate language-specific functions into dedicated files
description:
The file src/utils/codeUtils.ts contains mixed concerns - general utilities and language-specific functions. This makes the code harder to maintain and organize. Create separate files for language-specific functions like:

- fixHtmlJsxSpacing → create htmlJsxUtils.ts
- Language-specific parameter configuration → languageConfig.ts

This follows the Single Responsibility Principle and improves code organization.

title: Related File Context - Include imports from related files
description: Include imports and context from related files in completion context for better accuracy in multi-file projects.

title: Extract duplicated error handling logic (mistralClient.ts:426-438,668-680)
description: Identical 13-line error handling for 'no Route matched' appears in both getCompletion() and getStreamingCompletion(). Extract to shared method.

title: Clean up JSDoc in mistralClient.ts
description: Remove redundant JSDoc from src/services/mistralClient.ts: (1) Simplify file-level JSDoc (lines 1-43, especially 20-36 serverURL block), (2) Remove obvious parameter descriptions like '@param apiKey The API key', (3) Keep method summaries and @returns, (4) Preserve complex explanations (e.g., cache key generation, error handling types)
close_reason: JSDoc cleanup completed - removed redundant parameter descriptions while preserving method summaries and important notes

title: Remove or inline unused getConsecutiveBlankLines() (contextUtils.ts:476-490)
description: Function only called once, result never used meaningfully. Either inline logic or remove if it doesn't provide significant value.

title: Comprehensive codebase review - security, performance, code quality, architecture
Add error handling to unresolved promise (extension.ts:288-305)
description: Welcome message timeout contains async IIFE that's voided without error handling. Should add try-catch or properly await.

title: Fix syntax error in import pattern (contextUtils.ts:269)
description: Line 269 has 'line.startsWith('require(' instead of 'line.startsWith("require("' - missing closing quote and parenthesis.

title: Optimize document scanning to single-pass (contextUtils.ts:76-99)
description: Currently performs 3 separate scans of up to 200 lines each (O(3n) complexity). Refactor to single-pass collection for better performance on large files.
close_reason: Implemented single-pass document scanning optimization, reduced complexity from O(5n) to O(3n). Created extractAllContextInternal() unified function and refactored extractImports(), extractDefinitions(), and extractTypeDefinitions() to use it. All quality checks pass.

title: Update imports in dependent files
description:
Update all imports in files that depend on codeUtils.ts.

## Task Details:
1. Update mistralClient.ts:
   - Change: import { getLanguageParameters } from '../utils/codeUtils';
   - To: import { getLanguageParameters } from '../utils/codeUtils/languageParameters';
2. Update completionProvider.ts:
   - Change imports to use new modular structure:
     - sanitizeCompletion, fixHtmlJsxSpacing from textProcessing
     - isValidCompletion from contextAnalysis
     - getBestCompletion from scoring
3. Update extension.ts:
   - Change: import { findNextWordBoundary, findNextLineBoundary, applyPartialCompletion } from './utils/codeUtils';
   - To: import { findNextWordBoundary, findNextLineBoundary, applyPartialCompletion } from './utils/codeUtils/partialCompletion';
4. Run npm run lint and npm run compile to verify no import errors

- Part of epic: predicte-ta4 (Refactor codeUtils.ts into modular structure)

- This task should be done AFTER all new files are created
